name: nativescript-fonticon
description: Use custom font icon collections seamlessly with NativeScript.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-fonticon; tns plugin add ..; tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo; npm install; cd ..; npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin add ..; cd ..
